description: Pan of the bathhouse, Sen meeting Faceless at the bathhouse bridge, shots of activities within the bathhouse (mostly cleaning), Sen leaving the door open for Faceless, the dragon flying, Faceless giving bath tokens to Sen and gold to the frog (and then eating him), Faceless offering gold to Sen who rejects its, Sen running away from Faceless, Zenibaba appearing from the floor, more shots of Faceless rampaging.
